title: Neil deGrasse Tyson Takes The Colbert Questionert | Colbert Classic
description:
If you don't know about his connection to Joan Rivers, or where he stands on the "is a hot dog a sandwich" debate, do you really know Neil deGrasse Tyson? Stephen finds out what makes America's favorite astrophysicist tick in this edition of The Colbert Questionert.
We want your feedback on The Late Show Pod Show with Stephen Colbert! Visit http://www.colbertlateshow.com/podsurvey to take a brief survey.
